sentence.Network_en: His honesty was debauched by the prospect of easy money.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于指望不费力气就可赚到钱,他变得不那么诚实了.

sentence.Network_en: A scoffer, a debauched person, and, in brief, a man of Belial.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个玩世不恭的人, 一个生活放荡的家伙, 总而言之, 是个恶棍.

sentence.Network_en: A scoffer , debauched person , and , in brief, a man of Belial.
sentence.Network_cn: 玩世不恭者, 是只知一切事物的价钱而不知其价值的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Character  - Chinese Character Dictionary... ... 淫猥下流[ bawdy] 荒淫[ dissolute;licentious;debauched] 口淫[ fellatio].
SSAT 词汇 ...debauched 堕落的，放荡的fuzzy 毛茸茸的，模糊的

list.abs: your monthly debauch is finished already ., 你这个月已经发泄完了.

the cost of preserving highly leveraged financial behemoths still has the potential to bankrupt governments and debauch their currencies , wreaking yet more damage to their economies .保留高杠杆率的金融巨擘，仍有可能让政府破产，本币贬值，对本国经济造成更大的破坏。
英语100篇精读荟萃（中级篇） ... 16. gratuitous 无偿的，没有理由的。 17. debauch 使失落，放荡 18. sanction 支持，鼓励，认可.

entry.tran: 道德败坏的;放荡的;淫逸的
entry.def: If you describe someone as debauched, you mean they behave in a way that you think is socially unacceptable, for example because they drink a lot of alcohol or have sex with a lot of people.

example.tran: 负债累累、放荡无度的生活方式

auth_sentence.content: A commercially debauched popular culture makes learning disesteemed.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: A commercially debauched popular culture makes learning disesteemed.

auth_sentence.content: There are times when he clearly misses his debauched past.

auth_sentence.content: It's an ultra-stylish, sexually debauched Grand Guignol horror show.
